com.b2international.index

Interface IndexClientFactory


  • public interface IndexClientFactory
    Since:
    4.7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CLUSTER_HEALTH_TIMEOUT
      Configuration key to specify the time to wait until yellow cluster health state is reached in milliseconds.
      static java.lang.String CLUSTER_PASSWORD
      Configuration key to specify the password for authenticating with the Elasticsearch cluster
      static java.lang.String CLUSTER_URL
      Configuration key to specify the URL of the Elasticsearch cluster to connect to
      static java.lang.String CLUSTER_USERNAME
      Configuration key to specify the user name for authenticating with the Elasticsearch cluster
      static java.lang.String COMMIT_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL
      Configuration key to specify the concurrency level for bulk commit operations.
      static java.lang.String CONFIG_DIRECTORY
      Configuration key to use when specifying the configuration directory where index specific configuration can be found.
      static java.lang.String CONNECT_TIMEOUT
      Configuration key to specify the REST client connection timeout in milliseconds.
      static java.lang.String DATA_DIRECTORY
      Configuration key to use when creating file system based index.
      static int DEFAULT_CLUSTER_HEALTH_TIMEOUT
      The default timeout for waiting until yellow cluster health is reached is 5 minutes
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CLUSTER_URL
      The default cluster URL points to the embedded ES instance
      static int DEFAULT_COMMIT_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL
      The default concurrency level for the bulk operations depends on the number of cores you have max(1, cores / 4).
      static int DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
      The default connection timeout is 1s
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_INDEX_PREFIX
      The default index prefix is empty
      static int DEFAULT_RESULT_WINDOW
      The default result window (~100k items)
      static int DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT
      The default socket timeout (sending requests, waiting for a response) is 30s
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_TRANSLOG_SYNC_INTERVAL
      The default translog sync interval is 5 seconds.
      static java.lang.String INDEX_PREFIX
      Configuration key to specify the string each index name should be prefixed with (used in multi-tenant deployments).
      static java.lang.String NUMBER_OF_SHARDS
      Configuration key to specify the number of shards for the index.
      static java.lang.String RESULT_WINDOW_KEY
      Configuration key to specify the maximum number of documents to retrieve in a single call from the index.
      static java.lang.String SLOW_LOG_KEY
      Configuration key to specify slow log related configuration.
      static java.lang.String SOCKET_TIMEOUT
      Configuration key to specify the REST client communication timeout in milliseconds.
      static java.lang.String TRANSLOG_SYNC_INTERVAL_KEY
      Configuration key to specify the synchronization interval of the underlying transaction log.
